name: westland-warrior-the-designer
title: The Designer
html:
Pixel Art

Pixel Art is a form of digital art, created through the use of software, where images are edited on the pixel level. Visit 22 Pixel Artists Creating Beautiful Retro Masterpieces for more.

Dušan Čežek

Inspired by the breathtaking Ashes Scene in The Big Lebowski

Website

Website

Skeuomorphism

Skeuomorphism brings things that almost feel touchable, to the flat touchscreens of today. Visit A Showcase of 50 Skeuomorphic Designs for more.

Minimalism and Typography

Typography is an example of minimalism. When things get too complicated, and there are too many colors, just delete everything and remember Minimalism. Visit Beautiful Web Type.

Business Practice: Dye Sublimation Printing

Allover Cut & Sew Dye Sublimation Workout Outfits.

Visit Spider Bite Designs for patterns and ideas.

Business Practice: Product Ideas

Business Practice: Product Ideas

Business Practice: Product Ideas

How To Design Sublimation T-shirts

Play Video

Sportswear Printing - All over Print - Cut - Sew ( basketball uniforms)

Play Video

Business Practice: Problems with non Cut & Sew

Below is a picture of why you must choose the Cut & Sew method. The printing process on pre-made garments is flawed, the gas will not permeate wrinkles that are sure to occur on pre-made garments. You must first create the fabric, and then Cut & Sew the garment. Take a look at the source video that demonstrates the problem with sublimating pre-made garments in a bit more detail.

Business Practice: Problems with non Cut & Sew

Below is a picture of why you must choose the Cut & Sew method. The printing process on pre-made garments is flawed, the gas will not permeate wrinkles that are sure to occur on pre-made garments. You must first create the fabric, and then Cut & Sew the garment. Take a look at the source video[37] that demonstrates the problem with sublimating pre-made garments in a bit more detail.

Skeuomorphism

Skeuomorphism brings things that almost feel touchable, to the flat touchscreens of today. Visit A Showcase of 50 Skeuomorphic Designs for more.

Minimalism and Typography

Typography is an example of minimalism. When things get too complicated, and there are too many colors, just delete everything and remember Minimalism. Visit Beautiful Web Type.

Sportswear Printing - All over Print - Cut - Sew ( basketball uniforms)

Sportswear Printing - All over Print - Cut - Sew ( basketball uniforms)

Business Practice: Problems with non Cut & Sew

Below is a picture of why you must choose the Cut & Sew method. The
printing process on pre-made garments is flawed, the gas will not permeate
wrinkles that are sure to occur on pre-made garments. You must first create
the fabric, and then Cut & Sew the garment. Take a look at the source
video that demonstrates the problem with sublimating pre-made garments
in a bit more detail.
